name: Dock
description: A structure extending into water provides mooring for ships and access to maritime trade. The waterfront location creates opportunities for smuggling and piracy, while the constant flow of goods and people provides information and employment.
atmosphere: Wooden pilings support the extended platform while ships tie up alongside for loading and unloading. Seagulls cry overhead as sailors work with ropes and cargo. The air carries salt spray, fish, and maritime activity. Warehouses and taverns line the busy waterfront.
